name: Royal Mail Group
membership: Royal Mail Group is a member of PostEurop (ww.posteurop.org) and a shareholder of the International Post Corporation (www.ipc.be).
goal:
Royal Mail Group is one of the largest delivery companies in Europe and comprises Royal Mail, Parcelforce Worldwide and General Logistics Systems (GLS):

Royal Mail is proud to be the universal postal service provider in the UK, delivering a six-days-a-week, one-price-goes-anywhere postal service to more than 29 million addresses.

Parcelforce Worldwide operates a separate UK network for express parcels.

GLS is our ground based, deferred parcels business operating in 42 countries across wider Europe and the United States.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Postal Services Directive
Digital Single Market
VAT
Data Protection
International trade
